alert.note: Alert for Marion; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:21AM EST until February 20 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... White River, Eagle Creek, and Eel River. .Melted snowpack combined with rainfall amounts of one to over two inches from Wednesday evening through today falling on frozen ground has caused significant runoff which will produce flooding along area rivers. Along the main stem rivers, flooding could be lengthened and possibly worsened by another storm system next week. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River near Nora. * WHEN...From late tonight to Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.3 feet, River Road just north of 86th Street near the Fashion Mall at the entrance to condominiums begins to flood. High water affects Ravenswood and River Edge Drive. Many basements in Ravenswood fill with one to two feet of water. Some basements fill with more than three feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 6.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 14.7 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued later today.
